meanings.definition: The quality or state of being typical.
meanings.sent1: Her typicality as a student made her stand out in the class.
meanings.sent2: The typicality of his behavior was evident in every situation.
meanings.sent3: The typicality of his love for ice cream was unmatched.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of uniqueness, her typicality shone like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The typicality of his laughter filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is typical.
meanings.sent1: The typicality of the weather in this region is unpredictable.
meanings.sent2: We analyzed the typicality of the data to draw conclusions.
meanings.sent3: The typicality of his excuses for being late was comical.
meanings.sent4: The typicality of her fashion sense was like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The typicality of his singing voice was truly remarkable.
